text: DXKB, currently branded Magic 89.3, is a radio station of Quest Broadcasting Inc. in Cagayan de Oro, Mindanao, Philippines. Operates daily from 5:00 AM to 1:00 AM. Formerly branded as Killerbee 89.3 from 1994 - 2013, this station, along with the other Killerbee stations, underwent nationwide reformatting, as they were relaunched under the Magic moniker (adopted from its parent station) by April 29, 2013. ==External links== *Magic 89.3 Live Streaming Category:Contemporary hit radio stations in the Philippines Category:Radio stations in Cagayan de Oro Category:Radio stations established in 1994 Category:Quest Broadcasting Category:1994 establishments in the Philippines
title: DXKB
